    2017

Reading of Quote from Victor Frankl

March 10, 2017

This is my first try at recording myself reading content for the public. I have a great appreciation for Victor Frankl and his work Man's Search for Meaning in Life. His work was the first I turned to when I began experiencing spritual existential anxiety. I hope you enjoy this piece.

If you wish to speak with me about this piece or my other work, you can find my contact information elsewhere on the site.
